text.autoconfig.musicnotification.title: Music Notification - Config
text.autoconfig.musicnotification.option:
Remove the sound when a toast appears and disappears.
ENABLED_ALL = Vanilla
DISABLED_MUSIC = Mute the sound for the Music Toast
DISABLE_ALL = Mute for every Toasts
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.musicnoti: Add toast notification when a music is playing, with the name, author and soundtrack of it.
